title: EBSI Verifiable Attestation
description: Schema of an EBSI Verifiable Attestation. Check this when creating the verifiable attestation

@context.description: Defines semantic context of the Verifiable Attestation. Check this when creating the verifiable attestation

id.description: Property. Defines unique identifier of the Verifiable Attestation

type.description: Property. Defines the Verifiable Credential type

issuer.description: Property. Defines the issuer of the Verifiable Attestation

issuanceDate.description: Property. Defines the date and time, when the Verifiable Attestation becomes valid

issued.description: Property. Defines when the Verifiable Attestation was issued

validFrom.description: Property. Defines the date and time, when the Verifiable Attestation becomes valid

validUntil.description: Property. Defines the date and time, when the Verifiable Attestation expires

expirationDate.description: Property. Defines the date and time, when the Verifiable Attestation expires

credentialStatus.description: Contains information about how to verify the status of the Verifiable Attestation (via the Revocation and Endorsement Registry, RER)

id.description: References record in the Revocation and Endorsement Registry (RER) to enable verification of a Verifiable Attestationâ€™s validity

type.description: Defines the Verifiable Credential status type

statusListIndex.description: Integer expressed as a string. The zero based index value identifies the bit position of the status

credentialSchema.description: Contains information about the credential schema (template) on which the Verifiable Authorisation is based

id.description: References the credential schema (template) stored on the (relevant) Trusted Schemas Registry (TSR) on which the Verifiable Authorisation is based

evidence.description: Contains information about the process which resulted in the issuance of the Verifiable Attestation

id.description: If present, it MUST contain a URL that points to where more information about this instance of evidence can be found.

proof.description: Property. Contains information about the proof

proofPurpose.description: Property. Defines the purpose of the proof

created.description: Property. Defines the date and time, when the proof has been created

verificationMethod.description: Property. Contains information about the verification method / proof mechanisms

jws.description: Property. Defines the proof value in JWS format
